entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -41.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -41.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -46.2°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
